<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15578</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Berühmte Europäer/innen</string>
            <string language="en">Famous europeans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Européens célèbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europeus famosos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Europei famosi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι διάσημοι Ευρωπαίοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europeos famosos</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Lernobjekt mit Multimedia Hachette erstellt: Berühmte Persönlichkeiten und Ereignisse aus der Geschichte Europas - erkenne das Bild oder das Ereignis.</string>
            <string language="en">Learning object made with Multimedia Hachette: Famous persons and events from history of Europe- recognize the picture or event.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objet d'étude fait avec des multimédia Hachette 
: Les personnes célèbres et les événements de l'histoire de 
l'Europe identifient l'image ou l'événement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Objeto de aprendizagem feito com multimedia 
Hachette: As pessoas famosas e os eventos do history de Europa 
reconhecem o retrato ou o evento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oggetto imparante fatto con le multimedia 
Hachette: Le persone famose e gli eventi da storia di Europa 
riconoscono l'immagine o l'evento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αντικείμενο εκμάθησης έκανε με τα πολυμέσα 
Hachette: Διάσημα πρόσωπα και γεγονότα από την ιστορία 
της Ευρώπης - αναγνωρίστε την εικόνα ή το γεγονός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Objeto que aprende hecho con las Multimedias 
Hachette: Las personas famosas y los acontecimientos de la 
historia de Europa reconocen el cuadro o el acontecimiento.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

            <string language="en">Exercise about European history,  famous persons - usable in history or civics lessons with student self-control</string>
